# 1. Introduction


Merchandise Trade data collated by the Department of Statistics Singapore comprised of total imports/ exports since January 1976. The data is segregated into various regions and countries. We were given a graph depicting the merchandise trade imports/exports for six countries over 2019 and 2020.
